Package ControlObject

Class StudentCourseRegistrar

java.lang.Object
ControlObject.StudentCourseRegistrar
public class StudentCourseRegistrar
extends java.lang.Object
control object to facilitate adding and dropping of courses.

    Register student to a course index using information from registrationKey

  • Method Details

    • addRegistration

      public void addRegistration​(java.lang.String matricNumber, java.lang.String courseCode, int indexNumber) throws java.io.IOException, java.lang.ClassNotFoundException, InvalidAccessPeriodException, InsufficientAUsException, ExistingCourseException, ExistingUserException, ExistingRegistrationException, NonExistentUserException, MaxEnrolledStudentsException, ClashingTimeTableException
      Register student to a course index using information from registrationKey
      Parameters:
      matricNumber - , student matric number.
      courseCode - course to be added.
      indexNumber - index number to be added.
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - cannot find file
      java.lang.ClassNotFoundException - class is not defined in project
      InvalidAccessPeriodException - accessed outside registration period
      InsufficientAUsException - not enough AUs to add course
      ExistingCourseException - course already exists
      ExistingUserException - user already exists
      ExistingRegistrationException - course already registered
      NonExistentUserException - user does not exist
      MaxEnrolledStudentsException - index reach it maximum student capacity
      ClashingTimeTableException - index will result in clashing time table
      See Also:
      Factory.getTextCourseDataAccessObject(ConsoleAdminSession), IReadCourseDataAccessObject.getCourse(String), Factory.getTextUserDataAccessObject(ConsoleAdminSession), IReadWriteUserDataAccessObject.updateStudent(Student), RegistrationKey.getCourseCode(), RegistrationKey.getIndexNumber(), RegistrationKey.getMatricNumber(), Course.getIndex(int), Index.enrollStudent(String), Student.registerWaitListCourse(String, int), Student.registerCourse(String, int), Student.registerAUs(int)

    • deleteRegistration

      public void deleteRegistration​(java.lang.String matricNumber, java.lang.String courseCode, int indexNumber) throws java.io.IOException, java.lang.ClassNotFoundException, InvalidAccessPeriodException, NonExistentRegistrationException, NonExistentUserException, NonExistentCourseException, ExistingCourseException, MaxEnrolledStudentsException, ExistingUserException
      Delete a student from a course index using information from registrationKey
      Parameters:
      matricNumber - , student matric number.
      courseCode - course to be added.
      indexNumber - index number to be added.
      Throws:
      NonExistentRegistrationException - student have not registered for the course index
      java.io.IOException - cannot find file
      java.lang.ClassNotFoundException - class is not defined in project
      InvalidAccessPeriodException - accessed outside registration period
      NonExistentRegistrationException - index not registered
      NonExistentUserException - user does not exist
      NonExistentCourseException - course does not exist
      ExistingCourseException - course already exists
      MaxEnrolledStudentsException - index reach it maximum student capacity
      ExistingUserException - user already exist
      See Also:
      Factory.getTextCourseDataAccessObject(ConsoleAdminSession), IReadCourseDataAccessObject.getCourse(String), IReadWriteCourseDataAccessObject.updateCourse(Course), Factory.getTextUserDataAccessObject(ConsoleAdminSession), IReadWriteUserDataAccessObject.updateStudent(Student), IReadUserDataAccessObject.getStudent(String), AbstractUser.getEmail(), RegistrationKey.getCourseCode(), RegistrationKey.getIndexNumber(), RegistrationKey.getMatricNumber(), Factory.createRegistrationKey(String, String, int), Course.getIndex(int), Course.updateIndex(Index), Index.dropStudent(String), IReadUserDataAccessObject.getStudent(String), Student.deregisterCourse(String), Student.deregisterAUs(int), Factory.createEmailMessenger(String), IMessenger.addRecipientEmail(String), IMessenger.sendMessage(String, String)
